abstract: In his last review as The Times's restaurant critic, Sam Sifton explains why Per Se is the best restaurant in New York.
snippet: In his last review as The Times's restaurant critic, Sam Sifton explains why Per Se is the best restaurant in New York.
lead_paragraph: This week's review - my last one as restaurant critic for The Times! - took me to Per Se, Thomas Keller's sumptuous and extraordinary restaurant in the Time Warner Center. It was last reviewed by my predecessor, Frank Bruni, in 2004. I think it is the best restaurant in New York.
